name: Lightgun Game 2 in 1: Cosmocop + Cyber Monster
overview: In the year 20XX, you are facing the most intelligent and sophisticated bio-tech monsters. Now, they are attacking! COSMOCOP: Sinik - the most prosperous planet in the galaxy. But now it is in a state of emergency! Your people are massacred by the bio-tech robots! CYBER MONSTER: The biology laboratory is under attack! Terminate the intruders right away. Prevent them from achieving mass multiplication!
